summary: The warrior Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a chalice, an amulet, and a sword, two of which are held by the wicked sorcerer Munkar.
cast: Rick Hill|Barbi Benton|Richard Brooker|Lana Clarkson|Victor Bo|Bernard Erhard|Augusto Larreta|Verónica Llinás|Marcos Woinsky|Adrián De Piero|Jorge Sorvik|Boy Olmi|Horacio Marassi|Patrick Duggan|Maria Fournery|Gabriela Rubinstein|Sebastián Larreta|Amalia Marty|Claudio Petty|Rudy Kumze|Cuello Alejandro Andrés
title: El último guerrero
